Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and CycleCloud's built-in monitoring tools to continuously track the health and performance of compute clusters. Identify and resolve any anomalies or issues.
Regularly check for updates to Azure CycleCloud software and apply patches to ensure the latest features and security fixes are in place.
Ensure that compute nodes are configured correctly and meet the requirements for workloads. Validate settings such as VM sizes, disk configurations, and network settings.
Regularly back up cluster configurations, including templates, scripts, and settings, to ensure recoverability in case of failure.
Perform audits of compute resource usage to ensure efficient utilization and cost management. Identify and address any over-provisioning or under-utilization.
Conduct failover tests to verify that clusters can recover from node failures or other disruptions. Ensure high availability and resiliency.
Regularly review and update security policies for CycleCloud clusters, including access controls, encryption settings, and firewall rules.
Analyze performance metrics and optimize cluster configurations to ensure workloads run efficiently. Adjust settings based on workload requirements.
Keep documentation for CycleCloud clusters up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or cluster outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Check and adjust compute quotas to ensure sufficient resources are available for workloads while avoiding unnecessary costs.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new CycleCloud features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding CycleCloud cluster performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
